testsuite.name: convert between json, xml and string

testcase.name: xml with attributes
testcase.system-out: * def xmlVar = <root><foo fizz="buzz">bar</foo></root>......................passed * json jsonVar = xmlVar.....................................................passed * match jsonVar == { root: { foo: { _ : 'bar', @: { fizz: 'buzz' }}}}.......passed * match jsonVar $.root.foo._ == 'bar'.......................................passed * match jsonVar $.root.foo.@ == { fizz: 'buzz' }............................passed * match jsonVar $.root.foo.@.fizz == 'buzz'.................................passed * match jsonVar $..foo.@.fizz == ['buzz']...................................passed * match jsonVar $..@.fizz contains 'buzz'...................................passed * match jsonVar $..foo.@ contains { fizz: 'buzz' }..........................passed

testcase.name: xml with namespaces
testcase.system-out: * def xmlVar = <ns1:root xmlns:ns1="http://foo.com" xmlns:ns2="http://bar.com"><ns2:foo fizz="buzz" ping="pong">bar</ns2:foo></ns1:root>.passed * json jsonVar = xmlVar.....................................................passed * match jsonVar ==..........................................................passed * match jsonVar $.ns1:root..ns2:foo.@ == [{ fizz: 'buzz', ping: 'pong' }]...passed * match jsonVar $..ns2:foo.@ == [{ fizz: 'buzz', ping: 'pong' }]............passed * match jsonVar $..ns2:foo.@ contains { fizz: 'buzz', ping: 'pong' }........passed * match jsonVar $..ns2:foo.@ contains only { fizz: 'buzz', ping: 'pong' }...passed * match each jsonVar $..ns2:foo.@ contains { ping: 'pong' }.................passed
